text: The Naxalite–Maoist insurgency is an armed conflict in India. It is being fought between Maoist groups, known as Naxalites or Naxals, and the Indian government. == Related pages== *List of ongoing armed conflicts ==References== Category:Politics of India Category:20th-century rebellions Category:Rebellions in Asia Category:Communism Category:Insurgencies Category:20th century in India Category:21st century in India
title: Naxalite–Maoist insurgency
